//FileReaderEx1importjava.io.*;publicclassEx14_15{publicstaticvoidmain(String[]args){//TODOAuto-generatedmethodstubtry{StringfileName="test.txt";FileInputStreamfis=newFileInputStream(fileName);FileReaderfr=newFileReader(fileName);intdata=0;//FileInputStream을이용해서파일내용을읽어화면에출력한다.while((data=fis.read())!=-1){System.out.print((char)data);}System.out.println();fis.close();//FileReader를이용해서파일내용을읽어화면에출력한다.while((data=fr.read())!=-1){System.out.print((char)data);}System.out.println();fr.close();}catch(IOExceptione){e.printStackTrace();}}}
